title: LeBron James Spoke Carefully—Until the NBA’s Crisis in China
text:
Four years ago, back when it seemed impossible that the NBA would be in a bitter feud with the Chinese government because of a tweet, LeBron James had to explain why he didn’t want to discuss a sensitive issue, even when it seemed like he was qualified to contribute to the national conversation.

A grand jury had declined to indict a police officer who had shot and killed a 12-year-old named Tamir Rice in Cleveland, and James was under pressure to use his position as the planet’s greatest basketball player and his city’s most...
description: NBA superstar LeBron James undercut the image he has cultivated over the last decade in one night as he called a tweet supporting Hong Kong’s protests “misinformed.”
